summary: A man arrives in New Orleans searching for his former girlfriend, an artist who now works in a bordello.
cast: Laurence Harvey|Capucine|Jane Fonda|Anne Baxter|Barbara Stanwyck|Joanna Moore|Richard Rust|Karl Swenson|Don 'Red' Barry|Juanita Moore|John Anderson|Ken Lynch|Todd Armstrong|Sherry O'Neil|John Bryant|Kathryn Card|Lillian Bronson|Ted Jacques|Chester Jones|Adrienne Marden|Paul Maxey|Joni Beth Morris|Bill Walker|Murray Alper|Steve Benton|Nesdon Booth|Cordy Clark|Crahan Denton|Duke Fishman|Barbara Hines|Virginia Holden|Alexander Lockwood|Edward Mallory|Elaine Martone|Miss Masters|Patricia Tiernan|Ray Walker|Willard Waterman|Florence Wyatt
title: La gata negra
